name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: x2yt - X post to YouTube channel in 1 click

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find the YouTube channel of the people you follow on X

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension makes it super-easy to go from reading a post on X to watch its creator's YouTube channel. It simply adds a  ðŸ“º icon next to people's name. So when they mention their latest video you can get to their YT channel in one click.
